Bash(# Test all demo account logins
echo "ðŸ§ª Testing all demo account logins..."

echo "1. Testing Admin login:"
curl -s -X POST http://localhost:3001/api/auth/login \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -d '{"email": "admin@school.edu", "password": "admin123"}' | jq '.user.role // .error'

echo "2. Testing Head of Teaching login:"
curl -s -X POST http://localhost:3001/api/auth/login \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -d '{"email": "head.teaching@school.edu", "password": "password123"}' | jq '.user.role // .error'

echo "3. Testing Head of Learning Support login:"
curl -s -X POST http://localhost:3001/api/auth/login \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -d '{"email": "head.support@school.edu", "password": "password123"}' | jq '.user.role // .error'

echo "4. Testing History Teacher login:"
curl -s -X POST http://localhost:3001/api/auth/login \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -d '{"email": "teacher.history@school.edu", "password": "password123"}' | jq '.user.role // .error')
